subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Is Tomcito for real, a legitimate Kentucky Derby contender, or is he a horse who will turn out to be outclassed when he faces the cream of the American 3-year-old crop?
snippet: Is Tomcito for real, a legitimate Kentucky Derby contender, or is he a horse who will turn out to be outclassed when he faces the cream of the American 3-year-old crop?
